backend/main.mo: Defines data models and initializes authorization and storage mixins for admin users, vehicles, blog posts, interactions, comments, and related CMS entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise summaries for various frontend components, pages, and admin modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the frontend app with favicon and title metadata.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation describing how to redeploy the frontend canister and validate routes and media manager functionality.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Wrapper that enforces admin authentication, with a debug bypass mode and redirects unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin dashboard layout providing navigation, sidebar, and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Utilities for storing, retrieving, migrating, and clearing admin session tokens and roles.
Debug config enabling authentication bypass and auto‑created super admin sessions.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Simple view informing users they lack admin permissions with a button to return to login.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Reusable header component for admin pages with title, subtitle, and optional actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts, including metadata, image selection, and comment moderation.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table with search, custom columns, edit/delete actions, and optional published status.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Media management panel allowing search, preview, and deletion of uploaded media assets with error handling.
Dialog for browsing and selecting media assets with search, preview, and auth-aware error states.
Button component that uploads media files by converting them to data URLs and sending them to the backend.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog form for creating or editing a promotion with fields for text data, image selection, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog form for adding or editing customer testimonials, including name, city, review, rating, image, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Large dialog for creating or editing vehicles with tabs for basic info, media, variants, specs, and optional commercial features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Renders checkboxes for commercial vehicle feature toggles and updates the parent state when a feature is toggled.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Provides input fields for technical specs and allows adding or removing additional feature strings.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Manages a list of vehicle variants with add, edit, delete, and feature management functionality.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating admin CMS data such as media assets, contacts, and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Empty placeholder export retained for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Handles admin session management, including validation, login flow, and an emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Provides a UI to test admin login, showing success or error results and token data.
Admin login form with session-based redirects, emergency bypass handling, and error display.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Loads and edits the admin user's profile with a simple form and save mutation.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: CRUD interface for blog posts including search, create/edit dialog, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard showing counts of vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, and simulations.
Manages contact form leads and credit simulations with search, tabbed lists, and delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media manager page showing upload tools and handling auth errors for media asset retrieval.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: CRUD management page for promotions with search, create/edit dialog, and deletion flow.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin page that lists, searches, creates, updates, and deletes testimonials with dialogs and toast feedback.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin page for managing vehicles with category filtering, search, CRUD actions, and form dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Admin interface to display and update visitor statistics with stat cards and a form.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: CSS file defining admin-specific color tokens, layout styles, table styling, and UI component themes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all public and admin pages with layouts, guards, and page components.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: Form component for submitting blog comments with validation, error display, and reset functionality.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Renders like, share, and comment buttons with tooltips and counters for a blog post.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Implements a contact form that validates required fields and submits contact data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Provides a credit simulation request form that validates inputs and sends simulation data through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with a reload option.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays dealer information, contact details, social media links, and visitor stats in the website footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Defines the public site layout with navbar, optional hero, content area, CTA section, footer, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Creates a mobile bottom bar with quick actions for calling, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and a popup menu.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Shows a slide-up sheet containing the main navigation menu for mobile views.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Responsive navigation bar with links, WhatsApp CTA, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Reusable section title component displaying an icon and heading text.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Bottom call‑to‑action section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with welcome message and tagline.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Vehicle display card showing image, pricing, tags, and links to detail or WhatsApp consult.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors with auto‑refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, identity state, and AuthClient handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching public data like vehicles, promotions, blogs, and interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Hook that tracks visitors and page views using mutation calls and session storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full blog post with interactions like likes, shares, and comments, fetching post data and handling meta tags.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with images and previews, linking to individual blog detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed information for a commercial vehicle with pricing, features, likes, and sharing options.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Displays categorized commercial vehicles (light, medium, tractor head) filtered from the full vehicle list.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form and displays contact details, location map, and sales consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows featured vehicles, a CTA banner, about section, vehicle search, and latest blog posts on the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed info for a passenger vehicle, including variants, pricing, images, likes, and sharing actions.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Fetches and lists all published non-commercial passenger vehicles using vehicle cards.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Loads and displays current promotions with images, details, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Shows customer testimonials with ratings, profile images, and reviews.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin routes for smoke testing and provides utilities for route validation and checklist generation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural constraints, known issues, and requirements for a stable automotive CMS system with backend/frontend separation and admin auth. Serves as a comprehensive status record for debugging, persistence, and admin feature planning.
